main_menu.message: Press 1 for loan guidance. Press 2 for bank agents.

income_check.message: What is your monthly income? Press 1 if your salary is below 10000. Press 2 if your salary is between 10000 and 20000. Press 3 if your salary is above 20000.

agent_contact.message: Thank You, A local financial helper will contact you soon.
agent_contact.sms_body: Thank You, A local financial helper will contact you soon.

result_mini.message: You are suitable for mini loans. The required documents are Aadhar and Bank Passbook. Contact the nearest branch of your bank. Thank you.
result_mini.sms_body: Eligible for mini loans. Docs: Aadhar, Bank Passbook. Contact bank. Thank you.

result_small.message: You are eligible for small personal loans or small business loans. The required documents are Aadhar, Bank Statement and Address Proof. Contact the nearest branch of your bank. Thank you.
result_small.sms_body: Eligible for small personal/business loans. Docs: Aadhar, Bank Stmt, Address Proof. Contact bank.

result_regular.message: You are eligible for regular bank loans with flexible repayments. Contact the nearest branch of your bank. Thank you.
result_regular.sms_body: Eligible for regular bank loans with flexible repayments. Contact the nearest branch of your bank.
